title: peace
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:42.01] Our coming-of-age has come and gone
[00:45.43] Suddenly the summer, it's clear
[00:48.46] I never had the courage of my convictions
[00:52.15] As long as danger is near
[00:55.65] And it's just around the corner, darling
[00:58.70] 'Cause it lives in me
[01:01.66] No, I could never give you peace
[01:06.53] 
[01:13.70] But I'm a fire, and I'll keep your brittle heart warm
[01:16.79] If your cascade ocean wave blues come
[01:20.16] All these people think love's for show
[01:22.48] But I would die for you in secret
[01:25.17] The devil's in the details, but you got a friend in me
[01:32.12] Would it be enough if I could never give you peace?
[01:39.22] Your integrity makes me seem small
[01:42.87] You paint dreamscapes on the wall
[01:46.36] I talk shit with my friends
[01:48.74] It's like I'm wasting your honor
[01:54.22] 
[02:03.26] And you know that I'd swing with you for the fences
[02:10.42] Sit with you in the trenches
[02:14.06] Give you my wild, give you a child
[02:18.38] Give you the silence that only comes when two people understand each other
[02:22.26] Family that I chose, now that I see your brother as my brother
[02:26.75] Is it enough?
[02:31.23] But there's robbers to the east, clowns to the west
[02:34.74] I'd give you my sunshine, give you my best
[02:37.70] But the rain is always gonna come if you're standing with me
[02:44.66] 
[02:47.88] But I'm a fire, and I'll keep your brittle heart warm
[02:51.34] If your cascade ocean wave blues come
[02:54.69] All these people think love's for show
[02:56.73] But I would die for you in secret
[02:59.58] The devil's in the details, but you got a friend in me
[03:06.31] Would it be enough if I could never give you peace?
[03:12.66] Would it be enough if I could never give you peace?
[03:19.15] Would it be enough if I could never give you peace?
[03:23.76]
